metadata.title: CVE-2016-7434 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The read_mru_list function in NTP before 4.2.8p9 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted mrulist query.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7434` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ntp - 1:4.2.6.p5+dfsg-3ubuntu2.14.04.10
ntpdate - 1:4.2.6.p5+dfsg-3ubuntu2.14.04.10
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ntp package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:4.2.6.p5+dfsg-3ubuntu2.14.04.10').
